RR_verdict: On our test runs, we learned that The Brooks Divide 4 delivers a solid performance. From its subtle yet grippy lugs that took us seamlessly from road to trail to the well-padded yet breathable upper that is comfy whether we took it for a run or a brisk walk through nature. All of that is offered at an incredibly competitive price point!
awards: Top pick in best Brooks trail running shoes
